title: I lost my blue essence collector ward
body:
I lost my ward.
When i select a champion i can't select my blue essence collector ward. it dissipered

replies.body: I've been seeing a lot of players (including myself actually) reporting that ward missing from their accounts. The wards are still showing up on your accounts on our end, but it seems like they just aren't showing in the client for now. The devs are still working this out, but hopefully, it should be ironed out with the next patch!
